name: TheAtlantic
text: Trump is "the unrivaled master at institutional corruption. And his approach to bending the Justice Department to his will will be studied as long as politicians in power fear legal accountability," @benjaminwittes writes: https://t.co/kcKn2cxWzt

name: TheAtlantic
text: "I learned that just because I’m aware of the destruction caused by racism," @jemelehill writes, "that doesn’t mean I’m automatically sensitive to other forms of racism, or in this case, anti-Semitism." https://t.co/xpXaOUBngp
